tp:treatment-sec.p: †Tolypaspidae Kiaer 1932: 24 (family) † Tolypaspis Schmidt 1893 [senior objective synonym of †Tolypelepidae; family name sometimes seen as †Tolypaspididae]

†Tolypelepidae Strand 1934: 328 (family) † Tolypelepis Pander 1856 [junior objective synonym of †Tolypaspidae, invalid, Art. 61.3.2, but name in prevailing recent practice Art. 40.2; family name also seen as † Tolypelepididae ]
